00030         public function process() {
00031                 
00032                 //read global settings
00033                 session_start();
00034                 $settings = $this->getSettings();
00035                 
00036                 //set GET/POST parameters
00037                 $this->gp = array_merge(t3lib_div::_GET(), t3lib_div::_POST());
00038                 if($settings['formValuesPrefix']) {
00039                         $this->gp = $this->gp[$settings['formValuesPrefix']];
00040                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['formValuesPrefix'] = $settings['formValuesPrefix'];
00041                 }
00042                 
00043                 $this->mergeGPWithSession();
00044                 
00045                 //set debug mode
00046                 $this->debugMode = ($settings['debug'] == '1')?TRUE:FALSE;
00047                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['debugMode'] = $this->debugMode;
00048                 
00049                 //find current step
00050                 $this->findCurrentStep();
00051                 
00052                 //set last step
00053                 $this->lastStep = $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep'];
00054                 if(!$this->lastStep) {
00055                         $this->lastStep = 1;
00056                 }
00057                 
00058                 //find total step count
00059                 $stepCount = 0;
00060                 foreach($settings as $step=>$options) {
00061                         if(is_numeric($step)) {
00062                                 $stepCount ++;
00063                         }
00064                 }
00065                 $this->totalSteps = $stepCount;
00066                 
00067                 //merge settings with specific settings for current step
00068                 if(isset($settings[$this->currentStep.'.']) && is_array($settings[$this->currentStep.'.'])) {
00069                         $settings = array_merge($settings,$settings[$this->currentStep.'.']);
00070                 }
00071                 
00072                 //set debug mode again. Maybe it is turned off for this step
00073                 $this->debugMode = ($settings['debug'] == '1')?TRUE:FALSE;
00074                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['debugMode'] = $this->debugMode;
00075                 
00076                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('Using controller "F3_MailformPlusPlus_Controller_Default"');
00077                 
00078                 //store step values in session
00079                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings'] = $settings;
00080                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep'] = $this->currentStep;
00081                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['lastStep'] = $this->lastStep;
00082                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['totalSteps'] = $this->totalSteps;
00083                 
00084                 $disableErrorChecks = false;
00085                 if($this->currentStep == $this->lastStep) {
00086                         $disableErrorChecks = true;
00087                 }
00088                 
00089                 //add some JavaScript for fancy form stuff
00090                 $this->addSpecialJS($settings);
00091                 
00092                 //set submitted
00093                 $submitted = $this->gp['submitted'];
00094                 
00095                 //read template file
00096                 $this->readTemplateFile($settings);
00097                 
00098                 // set stylesheet file
00099                 $this->setStyleSheet($settings);
00100                 
00101                 //init view
00102                 $viewClass = $settings['view'];
00103                 if(!$viewClass) {
00104                         $viewClass = 'F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Multistep';
00105                 }
00106                 $view = $this->componentManager->getComponent($viewClass);
00107                 $view->setLangFile($this->langFile);
00108                 $this->setViewSubpart($view,$settings,$this->currentStep);
00109                 
00110                 if($this->finished) {
00111                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('Form is finished!');
00112                 }
00113                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('Using view "'.$viewClass.'"');
00114                 
00115                 $errors = array();
00116                 
00117                 //if not submitted
00118                 if(!$submitted) {
00119                         
00120                         //clear session variables
00121                         $this->clearSession();
00122                         
00123                         $this->gp = array();
00124                         
00125                         //clear uploaded files in temp folder if configured
00126                         $this->clearTempFiles($settings['files.']['clearTempFilesOlderThanHours']);
00127                         
00128                         //run preProcessors
00129                         if(isset($settings['preProcessors.']) && is_array($settings['preProcessors.'])) {
00130                                 $this->runClasses($settings['preProcessors.']);
00131                         }
00132                         
00133                         //run init interceptors
00134                         if(isset($settings['initInterceptors.']) && is_array($settings['initInterceptors.'])) {
00135                                 $this->runClasses($settings['initInterceptors.']);
00136                         }
00137                         
00138                         //debug GET/POST parameters
00139                         if(is_array($this->gp) && $this->debugMode) {
00140                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('The current GET/POST values:<br />',false);
00141                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugArray($this->gp);
00142                         }
00143                                 
00144                         //display form
00145                         return $view->render($this->gp,$errors);
00146                         
00147                 //if submitted
00148                 } else {
00149                         
00150                         //save settings because they have to be changed for error validation
00151                         $oldSettings = $settings;
00152                         
00153                         //run init interceptors
00154                         if(isset($settings['initInterceptors.']) && is_array($settings['initInterceptors.'])  && !$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00155                                 $this->runClasses($settings['initInterceptors.']);
00156                         }
00157                         
00158                         //debug GET/POST parameters
00159                         if(isset($this->gp) && is_array($this->gp) && $this->debugMode) {
00160                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('The current GET/POST values:<br />',false);
00161                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugArray($this->gp);
00162                         }
00163                         
00164                         //load settings from right step for error checks, ...
00165                         if($this->currentStep > $this->lastStep) {
00166                                 $settings = $this->getSettings();
00167                                 if(is_array($settings[($this->currentStep-1).'.'])) {
00168                                         $settings = array_merge($settings,$settings[($this->currentStep-1).'.']);
00169                                 }
00170                                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings'] = $settings;
00171                         }
00172                         
00173                         //run validation
00174                         $valid = array(true);
00175                         if(isset($settings['validators.']) && is_array($settings['validators.'])  && !$_SESSION['submitted_ok'] && !$disableErrorChecks) {
00176                                 foreach($settings['validators.'] as $tsConfig) {
00177                                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('Calling Validator: '.$tsConfig['class']);
00178                                         $validator = $this->componentManager->getComponent($tsConfig['class']);
00179                                         
00180                                         //add requiredFields settings from plugin record, if class is the default validator or a subclass.
00181                                         if((is_a($validator,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Validator_Default") || is_subclass_of($validator,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Validator_Default")) && is_array($this->requiredFields)) {
00182                                                 $tsConfig['config.']['requiredFields'] = $this->requiredFields;
00183                                         }
00184                                         $res = $validator->validate($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.'],$errors);
00185                                         array_push($valid,$res);
00186                                 }
00187                         }
00188                         
00189                         //set settings back to current step settings because validation is over
00190                         $settings = $oldSettings;
00191                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings'] = $settings;
00192                         
00193                         //if form is valid
00194                         if($this->isValid($valid)) {
00195                                 if(!$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00196                                         $this->processFiles();
00197                                 }
00198                                 
00199                                 //if no more steps
00200                                 if($this->finished) {
00201                                         
00202                                         if(!is_array($this->gp)) {
00203                                                 $this->gp = array();
00204                                         }
00205                                         
00206                                         //run save interceptors
00207                                         if(isset($settings['saveInterceptors.']) && is_array($settings['saveInterceptors.']) && !$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00208                                                 $this->runClasses($settings['saveInterceptors.']);
00209                                         }
00210                                         
00211                                         //run loggers
00212                                         if(isset($settings['loggers.']) && is_array($settings['loggers.']) && !$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00213                                                 foreach($settings['loggers.'] as $tsConfig) {
00214                                                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Calling Logger: ".$tsConfig['class']);
00215                                                         $logger = $this->componentManager->getComponent($tsConfig['class']);
00216                                                         $logger->log($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.']);
00217                                                 }
00218                                         }
00219                                         
00220                                         //run finishers
00221                                         if(isset($settings['finishers.']) && is_array($settings['finishers.'])) {
00222                                                 foreach($settings['finishers.'] as $tsConfig) {
00223                                                         $finisher = $this->componentManager->getComponent($tsConfig['class']);
00224                                                         
00225                                                         //check if the form was finished before. This flag is set by the F3_Finisher_Confirmation
00226                                                         if(!$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00227                                                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Calling Finisher: ".$tsConfig['class']);
00228                                                                 
00229                                                                 $tsConfig['config.']['templateFile'] = $settings['templateFile'];
00230                                                                 $tsConfig['config.']['langFile'] = $settings['langFile'];
00231                                                                 $tsConfig['config.']['formValuesPrefix'] = $settings['formValuesPrefix'];
00232                                                                 
00233                                                                 //if the finisher returns HTML (e.g. F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation)
00234                                                                 if($tsConfig['config.']['returns']) {
00235                                                                         return $finisher->process($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.']);                      
00236                                                                 } else {
00237                                                                         
00238                                                                         //add email settings from plugin record if the finisher is the mail finisher or a subclass
00239                                                                         if((is_a($finisher,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Mail") || is_subclass_of($finisher,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Mail"))) {
00240                                                                                 $finisher->setEmailSettings($this->emailSettings);
00241                                                                                 
00242                                                                         //add redirect settings from plugin record if the finisher is the recirect finisher or a subclass
00243                                                                         } elseif((is_a($finisher,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Redirect") || is_subclass_of($finisher,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Redirect"))) {
00244                                                                                 if(strlen($this->redirectPage) > 0) {
00245                                                                                         $tsConfig['config.']['redirect_page'] = $this->redirectPage; 
00246                                                                                 }
00247                                                                         }
00248                                                                         $this->gp = $finisher->process($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.']);
00249                                                                 }
00250                                                                 
00251                                                         //if the form was finished before, only show the output of the F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation
00252                                                         } elseif((is_a($finisher,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation") || is_subclass_of($finisher,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation"))) {
00253                                                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Calling Finisher: ".$tsConfig['class']);
00254                                                                 $finisher = $this->componentManager->getComponent($tsConfig['class']);
00255                                                                 $tsConfig['config.']['templateFile'] = $settings['templateFile'];
00256                                                                 $tsConfig['config.']['langFile'] = $settings['langFile'];
00257                                                                 $tsConfig['config.']['formValuesPrefix'] = $settings['formValuesPrefix'];
00258                                                                 return $finisher->process($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.']);
00259                                                         }
00260                                                 }
00261                                         }
00262                                 
00263                                 //form is not finished, render next step
00264                                 } else {
00265                                         
00266                                         //if user clicked "submit"
00267                                         if($this->currentStep >= $this->lastStep) {
00268                                                 $this->storeGPinSession($settings);
00269                                         }
00270                                         
00271                                         //display form
00272                                         return $view->render($this->gp,$errors);
00273                                 }
00274                                 
00275                                 //not returned, but finished. What to do?
00276                                 
00277                         //if form is not valid
00278                         } else {
00279                                 
00280                                 //stay on current step
00281                                 if($this->lastStep < $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep']) {
00282                                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep']--;
00283                                 }
00284                                 
00285                                 //load settings from last step again because an error occurred
00286                                 if($this->currentStep > $this->lastStep) {
00287                                         $settings = $this->getSettings();
00288                                         if(isset($settings[($this->currentStep-1)."."]) && is_array($settings[($this->currentStep-1)."."])) {
00289                                                 $settings = array_merge($settings,$settings[($this->currentStep-1).'.']);
00290                                         }
00291                                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings'] = $settings;
00292                                 }
00293                 
00294                                 
00295                                 //reset the template because step had probably been decreased
00296                                 $this->setViewSubpart($view,$settings,($this->currentStep-1));
00297                                 
00298                                 //show form with errors
00299                                 #print get_class($view);
00300                                 return $view->render($this->gp,$errors);
00301                         }
00302                 }
00303                 
00304                 
00305         }
00306         
00313         protected function findCurrentStep() {
00314                 if(isset($this->gp) && is_array($this->gp)) {
00315                         $highest = 0;
00316                         foreach (array_keys($this->gp) as $pname) {
00317                                 
00318                                 if (strstr($pname,'step-')) {
00319                                         $mpPage = substr($pname,strpos($pname,'step-'),6);
00320                                         
00321                                         if (strpos($mpPage, '-')) {
00322                                                 $mpPage = substr($mpPage,strrpos ($mpPage, '-')+1);
00323                                         } //if end
00324                                         
00325                                         if(intVal($mpPage) > $highest) {
00326                                                 $highest = intVal($mpPage);
00327                                         }
00328                                 } // if end
00329                         } // foreach end
00330                         $this->currentStep = $highest;
00331                 }
00332                 if(!$this->currentStep) {
00333                         $this->currentStep = 1;
00334                 }
00335         }
00336         
00337         
00338         
00348         protected function setViewSubpart(&$view,&$settings,$step) {
00349                 $this->finished = 0;
00350                 
00351                 //search for ###TEMPLATE_FORM[step][suffix]###
00352                 if(strstr($this->templateFile,"###TEMPLATE_FORM".$step.$settings['templateSuffix']."###")) {
00353                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Using subpart \"###TEMPLATE_FORM".$step.$settings['templateSuffix']."###\"");
00354                         $view->setTemplate($this->templateFile, 'FORM'.$step.$settings['templateSuffix']);
00355                         
00356                 //search for ###TEMPLATE_FORM[step]###
00357                 } elseif(strstr($this->templateFile,"###TEMPLATE_FORM".$step."###")) {
00358                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Using subpart \"###TEMPLATE_FORM".$step."###\"");
00359                         $view->setTemplate($this->templateFile, 'FORM'.$step);
00360                         
00361                 //search for ###TEMPLATE_FORM###
00362                 } elseif(strstr($this->templateFile,"###TEMPLATE_FORM###")) {
00363                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Using subpart \"###TEMPLATE_FORM###\"");
00364                         $view->setTemplate($this->templateFile, 'FORM');
00365                         
00366                 //mark form as finished
00367                 } else {
00368                         
00369                         $this->finished = 1;
00370                 }
00371         }
00372         
00379         protected function mergeGPWithSession() {
00380                 session_start();
00381                 if(!is_array($this->gp)) {
00382                         $this->gp = array();
00383                 }
00384                 if(!is_array($_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'])) {
00385                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'] = array();
00386                 }
00387                 
00388                 foreach($_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'] as $step=>&$params) {
00389                         if(is_array($params)) {
00390                                 unset($params['submitted']);
00391                                 if($step != $this->currentStep) {
00392                                         foreach($params as $key=>$value) {
00393                                                 $this->gp[$key] = $value;
00394                                         }
00395                                 }
00396                         }
00397                 }
00398         }
00399         
00407         protected function storeGPinSession(&$settings) {
00408                 session_start();
00409                 
00410                 //merge GET/POST again to get a third version of submitted values.
00411                 //the values in $this->gp are not reliable because they got merged with $_SESSION in initPreProcessor
00412                 $newGP = array_merge(t3lib_div::_GET(), t3lib_div::_POST());
00413                 if($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings']['formValuesPrefix']) {
00414                         $newGP = $newGP[$_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings']['formValuesPrefix']];
00415                 }
00416                 
00417                 //set the variables in session
00418                 foreach($newGP as $key=>$value) {
00419                         if(!strstr($key,"step-") && !strstr($key,"submitted")) {
00420                                 #$_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'][$key] = $value;
00421                                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'][$this->currentStep-1][$key] = $value;
00422                         }
00423                 }
00424                 
00425                 //check for checkbox and radiobutton fields using the values in $newGP
00426                 if($settings['checkBoxFields']) {
00427                         $fields = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$settings['checkBoxFields']);
00428                         foreach($fields as $field) {
00429                                 if(!isset($newGP[$field]) && isset($this->gp[$field])) {
00430                                         #$_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'][][$field] = array();
00431                                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'][$this->currentStep-1][$field] = array();
00432                                 }
00433                         }
00434                 }
00435                 if($settings['radioButtonFields']) {
00436                         $fields = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$settings['checkBoxFields']);
00437                         foreach($fields as $field) {
00438                                 if(!isset($newGP[$field]) && isset($this->gp[$field])) {
00439                                         #$_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'][$field] = "";
00440                                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'][$this->currentStep-1][$field] = array();
00441                                 }
00442                         }
00443                 }
00444         }
